product_name: Outdoor Research Rampart Rain Pants - Men's
long_description: Trust the no-nonsense Rampart Rain Pants from Outdoor Research to help protect you from downpours on your treks. Full-length side zippers offer easy on/off and venting. 100% polyester 2-layer Barrier(TM) fabric is waterproof and fully seam-sealed. Full-length, double-separating side zippers offer venting options and allow for a drop seat when nature calls. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Elastic waist has drawcord to fine-tune the fit; cuffs provide snap closures. Durable yet lightweight pants pack down small; single rear pocket doubles as a stuff sack. The Outdoor Research Rampart Rain Pants accept accessory suspenders (not included).
short_description: Trust the no-nonsense Rampart Rain Pants from Outdoor Research to help protect you from downpours on your treks. Full-length side zippers offer easy on/off and venting.
